casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Aggrey Winston MANNING No. 121P15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 17, 2017 Aggrey W. Manning, for Manning, Aggrey W. Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 25th of September 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of October 2017."

Ervin, J. recused
